NEXTBOT/BehaveUpdate.description: Called to update the bot's behaviour.

NEXTBOT/BodyUpdate.description: Called to update the bot's animation.

NEXTBOT/OnContact.description: Called when the nextbot touches another entity.

NEXTBOT/OnIgnite.description: Called when the bot is ignited.

NEXTBOT/OnInjured.description: Called when the bot gets hurt.

NEXTBOT/OnKilled.description: Called when the bot gets killed.

NEXTBOT/OnLandOnGround.description: Called when the bot's feet return to the ground.

NEXTBOT/OnLeaveGround.description: Called when the bot's feet leave the ground - for whatever reason.

NEXTBOT/OnNavAreaChanged.description: Called when the nextbot enters a new navigation area.

NEXTBOT/OnOtherKilled.description: Called when someone else or something else has been killed.

NEXTBOT/OnStuck.description: Called when the bot thinks it is stuck.

NEXTBOT/OnUnStuck.description: Called when the bot thinks it is un-stuck.

NEXTBOT/Use.description: Called when a player 'uses' the entity.
